data.title: Nancy Carell biography: Age, height, husband, kids, net worth
data.meta_description: NANCY CARELL is an American-born actress, comedian and writer. Check out this article to know more about her age, height, husband, kids, and net worth.
data.text:
Nancy Carell is an American-born actress, author, comedian, and TV producer. She is popular for her work in the American late-night television show Saturday Night Live.

Apart from Saturday Night Live, she is also known for her distinguished works in The Daily Show and The Office. In 2016, she joined her husband Steve Carell in the creation of the TBS comedy known as Angie Tribeca.

Nancy Carell profile summary

Full name: Nancy Ellen Carell

Date of birth: 19th July 1966

Place of birth: Cohasset, Massachusetts, USA

Nancy Carell age: 54 years (as of 2020)

Nationality: American

Ethnicity: White

Height: 5 feet 8 inches

Weight: 70kg

Marital status: Married

Spouse: Steve Carell

Profession: Actress, author, comedian, TV producer

Net worth: $80 million

Biography

Nancy was born on 19th July 1966 in Cohasset, Norfolk, Massachusetts. She is the daughter of Robert and Carol. She has one sibling, a sister who goes by the name Tish Vivado. Tish is the manager of Marshfield Hills General Store in Massachusetts. Steve and Nancy Carell own the store.

Education

After her elementary education, he joined Cohasset High School. Later, Nancy Carell hot actress enrolled at Boston College and graduated in 1988. Carell was a part of the improvisational troupe known as My Mother's Fleabag in Boston College.

Career

Nancy began her career after participating in the comedy troupe known as The Second City. She joined the Saturday Night Live cast between 1995 and 1996 like a majority of other alumni from the troupe.

She later started working on the satirical TV news program The Daily Show where she appeared in close to 100 episodes. The show marked the beginning of her fame in the media. She then started making appearances in different movies.

In 2003, she starred in Anger Management. Two years later, she starred in the 2005 romantic comedy known as The 40-Year-Old Vi*gin. She acted alongside her husband, who played the lead role of Andy Stitzer.

Nancy Carell movies and TV shows

She has also played numerous other roles as follows:

Television shows

1995 to 1996 - Saturday Night Live

1998 - Lateline as Jill

1999 - Random Play as various characters

2007 - The Naked Trucker and T-bones Show as Marcia

2009 - The Goode Family as Helen Goode

2012 - Georgia as Davinia

2005 to 2013 - The Office as Carol

Movies

2003 - Anger Management as Flight Attendant

2005 - The 40-Year-Old Vi*gin

2012 - Seeking a Friend for the End of the World

Nancy Carell kids and husband

The actress is happily married to American actor, producer, comedian, writer and director Steve Carell. Steve Carell and Nancy first met during the set of The Second City. Steve Carell wife was a student at the time.

Even though the two were attracted to each other, it took them a few weeks before they could gather the courage to go out on their first date. Nancy and Steve Carell dated for a few years before tying the knot on 5th August 1995.

The couple has two lovely children. The firstborn (Elisabeth Anne) was born in 2001, and the 2nd born (John) was born in 2004. The family of four spends their time in their two family-owned houses in Los Angeles and Marshfield, Massachusetts.

Body measurements

Nancy Carell height is 5 feet 8 inches. She weighs 70 kg. The actress measures 32-26-32 inches for her bust, waist and hips respectively. She has an oval-shaped face, brown eyes and medium brown hair. She wears a dress size 8 (US).

Net worth

Nancy has been in the entertainment industry as an actress, writer, and comedian since 1995. As a result, she has gained a lot of wealth from the shows and films she has appeared in. As of 2020, Nancy Carell net worth is roughly $80 million.

Nancy Carell has been in the entertainment industry for more than two decades now. In all these years, she has given her best, thus becoming a majority's favourite. She is also a happily married woman and mother of two.
